comment: He continuously embarrasses his students when they do something he doesn't like. He is also very trigger happy to abuse his power dynamic by bullying students, for ex. he locked me out of the classroom like a 5th grader when I went to use the bathroom. Clearly struggles from short man syndrome and insanely rude. Also doesn't have teaching degree.
VERY HARD. STEER AWAY FROM THIS PROFESSOR. HE GAVE THE WHOLE CLASS A F
